questionTitle: Which of the following transport protocol is used for POP3 and IMAP access in Gmail?
questionExplanation: TLS stands for Transport Layer Security.

questionOption1: Gmail is written to look like an Internet chat utility
questionOption2: Gmail tends to perform most of its operations such as archiving on the conversation as a whole
questionOption3: When a conversation gets to be 50 messages long, Gmail splits the conversation into a second section
questionExplanation: When a conversation gets to be 100 messages long, Gmail splits the conversation into a second section.

questionTitle: Which of the following prototypical POP3 Webmail mail retrieval service was established in 1997?
questionExplanation: From the Mail2Web interface, you can read messages, reply, and create new messages.

questionTitle: Mail2Web also has a mobile email service based on Exchange called __________ Mobile Email.
questionExplanation: Mail2Web.com provides online access to any POP3 account.

questionOption1: In Gmail, you cannot construct searches with multiple operators using the Advanced Search feature
questionOption2: Google uses an advertiser-driven model to supply its free service to users
questionOption3: RSS content can be read in most modern browsers
questionExplanation: In its search function, Google uses the keywords from your search and your search history to match sponsors to you.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Microsoft’s Webmail offering and with localized versions in 36 languages?
questionExplanation: Windows Live Hotmail is one of the central applications in Microsoft Windows Live product portfolio.

questionTitle: Which of the following browser is not supported for Hotmail Service?
questionExplanation: Windows Live Hotmail was created with Ajax technology.

questionTitle: Which of the following Hotmail feature has ability to set a spam filter directly with your mouse?
questionExplanation: Hotmail has a strong feature set.

questionTitle: Which of the following adds the ability to synchronize messages, contacts, and calendars on any mobile phone that has ActiveSync?
questionExplanation: Hotmail also can be viewed in Microsoft Office Outlook using the Outlook Connector or using Windows Live for Windows Mobile phones on that phone’s operating system.

questionTitle: Yahoo! added a version of the user interface based on Ajax that looks like a form of _____________
questionExplanation: This Ajax interface is based on the work of Oddpost, which the company acquired in 2004.
